meanings.definition: A group of reptiles resembling lizards, including the tuatara.
meanings.sent1: Rhynchocephalians are ancient reptiles that look like lizards.
meanings.sent2: I learned about rhynchocephalians in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The rhynchocephalians had a party and invited all the lizards.
meanings.sent4: In the world of reptiles, rhynchocephalians are the wise elders.
meanings.sent5: The zoo's exhibit on rhynchocephalians was fascinating.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of rhynchocephalians.
meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the rhynchocephalian features of the fossil.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace had a rhynchocephalian charm that she loved.
meanings.sent3: The rhynchocephalian cupcakes at the party were a hit.
meanings.sent4: His writing style was described as rhynchocephalian by the critics.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of rhynchocephalian beauty in her painting.
